wikipedia_page.main: John Richard Lewis (August 1881 – 12 September 1954) was a Welsh international footballer, who played his club football as a forward for various clubs in the south of England.

response: John Lewis (1940–2020) was the president of the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee and a member of U.S. House of Representatives from Georgia.
John Lewis may also refer to:
*John Lewis & Partners, a chain of department stores in the United Kingdom
